formatted_address: No.11.15 Jalan Eko Botani 3/4 Eko Botani Iskandar Puteri, 79100 Johor Bahru, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: The Bierhaus Eco Botanic

reviews.text: The staff were incredibly friendly and welcoming, making me feel right at home. The service was prompt and attentive without being intrusive. The food was consistently delicious and well-prepared. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back and would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a great meal with warm, friendly service by Dhan!

I have dined in a few outlets; this is my first time here. The atmosphere is chill and cosy. Nice music. Kids are enjoying their pizza, spaghetti, and fries. Overall, the food is nice. Service is good, too! üòãüçïüçùüçü #Restaurant #Family #Dinner #GoodFood #ChillVibes

I believe I will return to this place as we love the  Kilkenny beers, 5 stars to the steak yummy as it cooks to perfection Thanks to the chefs. The Pork however is too sweet maybe Its honey but then it pair with sweet sauce? ü§® I love the food here because the amount of vege they give and garlic with brocolli is Just perfect.

Weekday lunch promotion 15.90, with free drinks (free flow mushroom soup, coffee, tea, ice lemon tea). With this price the food/ environment considered appropriate cp value. Burger taste good.
Is.not crowded. The staffs are friendly.

Ribs was good, marinated very well and super flavourful. The schnitzel and fries was deep fried really well too which was nice.

Hated the mash potatoes though, could be the driest mash potatoes I‚Äôve ever had, it tasted like mashed cardboard üòÇ

Looking through the reviews, it seems like the lunch menu would be more attractive. Food was so-so for the price charged, 200RM for 3 dish + 3 drinks. Smoking was also an issue for us, nobody wants to inhale second-hand smoke üëç
